alert.note: Alert for George; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 5:23PM CST until January 09 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern George County in southeastern Mississippi... Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CST. * At 523 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Lumberton to 8 miles southeast of Poplarville to 5 miles east of Mcneil, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wiggins, Perkinston and McHenry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Mississippi.
